name: Conflict Area
description:
Conflict Area is an FPS game that you can play with your friends and have fun with great graphics and 5 different game modes. It is a multiplayer and singleplayer game where you can compete fiercely by raising the action with the conflicts in the narrow area and highlighting the team game with its large maps.

Also :

  • There are 7 different weapons.

  • 2 different patterns are offered for free in each weapon.

  • There are 5 different game modes (Conquest, Flag Snatch, Assault, Death Match, Team Death Match).

  • There are 4 different maps.

  • The game is in early access right now. You can support us by purchasing the game.

  • Download Size: 1.5Gb / Required Space: 4Gb
